boardgame.name: Ulm
boardgame.description: Ulm is at its heyday. The construction of the Ulm cathedral has not yet been completed, but the city is already wealthy and prestigious._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Ulm, players try to expand their spheres of influence and to make optimal use of the hustle and bustle on the marketplace around the cathedral._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2017 International Gamers Award - General Strategy: Multi-player Nominee
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Cult of the New Board Game Podcast Episode 031 – All About Airecon
Episode 7: Star Realms, Morels, Ulm, Kodama, Rokoko

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet

Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable
